Add New Product  

  • {{ product.name }}

    {{ product.description }}
import { Component, Output, EventEmitter } from '@angular/core'; type Products = { name: string; description: string; } @Component({ selector: 'app-products', templateUrl: './products.component.html', styleUrls: ['./products.component.css'], }) export class ProductsComponent { // products!: Products[] | []; displayAddProductModal: boolean = false; //display button when user records exists in db displayEditProductModal: boolean = false; displayDeleteProductModal: boolean = false; products = [ { name: "Fish hook", description: "For baiting and catching fish"}, { name: "Anonymitter", description: "The Anonymous identifier" }, { name: "Fish hook", description: "For baiting and catching fish"}, { name: "Anonymitter", description: "The Anonymous identifier" }, { name: "Fish hook", description: "For baiting and catching fish"}, { name: "Anonymitter", description: "The Anonymous identifier" }, { name: "Fish hook", description: "For baiting and catching fish"}, { name: "Anonymitter", description: "The Anonymous identifier" }, { name: "Fish hook", description: "For baiting and catching fish"}, { name: "Anonymitter", description: "The Anonymous identifier" }, { name: "Fish hook", description: "For baiting and catching fish"}, { name: "Anonymitter", description: "The Anonymous identifier" } ] // toggle 'add product' modal addProductModal(value: boolean){ this.displayAddProductModal = value; } // toggle 'edit product' modal editProductModal(value: boolean){ this.displayEditProductModal = value; } // toggle 'delete product' modal deleteProductModal(value: boolean){ this.displayDeleteProductModal = value; } }
